flawed_nl_solution:
Jed is 25 - 10 = <<25-10=51>>51 years old now.
So, Matt is 51 - 10 = <<51-10=41>>41 years old now.
Thus, the sum of their present ages is 51 + 41 = <<51+41=92>>92.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 15, not 51. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
